item.title: The challenge of running lavalink
item.description: Hello ðŸ‘‹ Hi, I’m Darren! I am a sysadmin. Meaning I have a lot of servers that I rent for testing and development. I also have a discord music bot Model Buses that uses lavalink. Having one lavalink server isn’t enough…. jk it’s prob enough, but I like to have a few more for redundancy. As of writing this, my bot model buses are on 97 guilds, which isn’t that much.

item.title: How to make lavalink server
item.description: What are we doing today In this tutorial we will be setting up lavalink server! ðŸŽ‰ Let’s get started. Now, first thing first Setting up the enviroment To make a lavalink server, you will need a java 13 or greater, I recommend using Azul Zulu java 16 or 17. You can download & setup java by going to here: Linux (Make sure to get zulu16-jdk or zulu17-jdk Ubuntu / Debian; APT Base Rhel / CentOS / Oracle; RPM Base Arch; I use arch btw.
